Summary Note:
Brunner Gmür Kammermann and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Zürich. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Brunner Gmür Kammermann is a seasoned professional with over 19 years of experience.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Brunner Gmür Kammermann and Barbara tied the knot in 2006. They are proud parents of 1 child: Müller.
Education Background:
Brunner earned his secondary school diploma from Kantonsschule Zürich Nord Zurich in 2000.
He then attended University of Zurich, which he graduated in 2005.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 19 years, Brunner Gmür Kammermann has established himself as a key player in the industry.
At Gunvor Group Ltd. (Swiss branch), Brunner Gmür Kammermann held the position of Junior Trader from 2006 to 2009, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Glencore International AG as a Senior Trader, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2010 to 2013.
His tenure as a Trading Desk Manager at Gunvor Group Ltd. (Swiss branch) from 2013 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 590000 CHF from his earnings at all companies.
He owns villa in Aarau, where he resides. It is worth 4610000 CHF.

He purchased house in Olten, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 2900000 CHF.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 5830000 CHF from his late mother, a renowned Tech Entrepreneur, in 2012.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Brunner as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
